0.1.name: wordpress/appwidget
0.1.description:
With appwidget you can easily share your Android app on your blog posts.

For example if you need to promote the Appchina app ( Market link for Appchina ) which has com.yingyonghui.market as package name, you only need to insert com.google.android.youtube in your editor and it will generate: * icon * name * developer * rating of the app.

Website: http://i.appchina.com/wp-plugin/
